songs.title: Errrbody FAKE
songs.lyrics:
Errybody
This shit here for errybody
Errybody
Aye Im right back at 'em
Errybody
Errybody
(All the hustlaz)
Errybody
Errybody

[Hook]
Errybody wanna be a dope boy
Errybody wanna be a coke boy
Errybody gotta chopper
Errybody gettin money
Errybody say they from da hood
Errybody real
But they not boy
Erry bitch claim that she a bad bitch
Errybody on Instagram lookin like they mad rich but they not
Errybody say they started from the bottom now they hit the top

[Verse 1]
Go!
Errybody say they got haters
Errybody got paper
I guess ain't nobody broke
But who is me ta talk about the next nigga out here flexin
When I done did it before
And who is you ta talk about this whip ain't mine?
When you see a nigga in wit the top down
Boy you sound like a hater on the front like
Imma hit the block for you one more time
Errybody got some to say
Errybody wanna hate
If you ask me erry bitch gay
In the club dancin on her friend tryin ta pretend
When you know you go both ways
Erry nigga think that shit cool
Dont you be fooled
You should bring your friend home witchu
Tell ya eat her pussy then you can't be mad
Cuz you shouldn't gave me da wrong picture

[Hook]
Errybody wanna be a dope boy
Errybody wanna be a coke boy
Errybody gotta chopper
Errybody gettin money
Errybody say they from da hood
Errybody real
But they not boy
Erry bitch claim that she a mad bitch
Errybody on Instagram lookin like they mad rich but they not
Errybody say they started from the bottom now they hit the top

[Verse 2]
Errybody fucking errybody bitch
Errybody witnessed shit
Thats life
And every nigga try to fuck the next nigga bitch
Not knowing his bitch is the next nigga bitch
Rose Gold Rollie
Thats a check on my wrist
Ooooh
Im boutta blow a check in this bitch (I am)
Truth be told I dont even drink
But Im tryin ta turn up for a bitch
I know a lot of nobodys wanna be somebody
Plug on the way
Thats a new Bugatti
25 bands
Just fucked up Folley's
CMG-E nigga thats errybody
Nobody wanna be lame
Know a lot of nobodies but won't say nobodies name
Nobody snatchin my chain
True street nigga
I ain't in nobody lane

[Hook]
Errybody wanna be a dope boy
Errybody wanna be a coke boy
Errybody gotta chopper
Errybody gettin money
Errybody say they from da hood
Errybody real
But they not boy
Erry bitch claim that she a mad bitch
Errybody on Instagram lookin like they mad rich but they not
Errybody say they started from the bottom now they hit the top

[Background]
Errybody
This shit here for errybody
Errybody
Aye Im right back at 'em
Errybody
Errybody
(All the hustlaz)
Errybody
Errybody

[Verse 3]
Errybody goin to the mall
Platinum Designer
Niggas got 100 dollar lineeups
Hermes belt on some DG Jeans
Child support lookin high
Know where ta find 'em
Couple niggas ballin in the club
Poppin bottles 'n buyin booze
But if a nigga wanna know the truth
Still owe the club and that rented ass coupe
Nigga watch ain't real then his chain ain't too
Shawty gotta million sum followers
A million sum problems
But she a different person onna Gram
Meet her in person you like where all da purses
Thought you had erry color
Shawty you ain't got nun
Errybody need ta be their self
Errybody famous
Ain't no regular people left
Errybody smokin on Kush
If ya smokin regular
You know you gotta smoke by yourself

[Hook]
Errybody wanna be a dope boy
Errybody wanna be a coke boy
Errybody gotta chopper
Errybody gettin money
Errybody say they from da hood
Errybody real
But they not boy
Erry bitch claim that she a mad bitch
Errybody on Instagram lookin like they mad rich but they not
Errybody say they started from the bottom now they hit the top

Cuz this shit for errybody
Errybody
I got money I pt on errybody
Errybody
Keep one in the head cuz I ont trust nobody
Nobody
Imma pull it out and let it ride
Imma hit errybody
Errybody
I swear you can get it pussy nigga

[Hook]
Errybody wanna be a dope boy
Errybody wanna be a coke boy
Errybody gotta chopper
Errybody gettin money
Errybody say they from da hood
Errybody real
But they not boy
Erry bitch claim that she a mad bitch
Errybody on Instagram lookin like they mad rich but they not
Errybody say they started from the bottom now they hit the top

I SAY THIS SHIT HERE FOR ERRYBODY, ERRYBODY
